prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgeContent:
Stránka, kterou hledáte, nebyla nalezena.

Omlouváme se za vzniklé potíže.

Vyhledejte znovu, co hledáte

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content:
---

The provided text appears to be an error message in Czech language, indicating that a requested web page was not found. The message apologizes for the inconvenience and suggests that the user should try searching again for the desired content.

---

The text contains HTML tags, suggesting it is part of a webpage structure. It includes a search module, implying that the website likely has a search functionality to help users find content.
